dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.logicOr
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the SearchBuilder logic button when OR logic is in place

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.logicOr` changes what will be displayed in the text of the SearchBuilder logic button when OR logic is set.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init language.searchBuilder.logicOr` parameter is `'Any Of'`.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the logic button to display a default text when OR logic is in place, in this case `'All Of'`.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.logicOr` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.

example.title: Change message for SearchBuilder logic button under OR conditions
